disease_info.summary: An epidermoid cyst is a small, benign cyst typically filled with keratin.  When infected, it can become swollen, red, and tender.  Treatment usually involves incision and drainage, and sometimes complete surgical removal.
precautions: Keep the area clean and dry.
Avoid squeezing or picking at the cyst.
Complete the full course of any prescribed antibiotics.
Follow up with your doctor as directed.

additional_notes: Follow up appointment scheduled in one week. Please call to confirm.
